seo.title: About STG Enterprise - Leading Mining Equipment Provider
seo.description: Learn more about STG Enterprise, our mission, vision, and commitment to providing top-notch mining equipment and solutions to our clients.
seo.keywords: STG Enterprise, about us, mining equipment, mission, vision, commitment

about.title: ABOUT US
about.since-establishment:
STG Holding is a dynamic and diversified holding company managing a portfolio of nine innovative and leading projects. Focused on the highest quality standards, STG Holding operates across various sectors, including construction, technology, hospitality, and corporate solutions.

Its subsidiaries — Mr Construction and Engineering Group, STG Enterprise, STG CRM, The Harry's, STMG, Vanguard Group, Beezz App, and StroyKaz Group — reflect the company's commitment to growth, innovation, and effective management in every field.

By fostering collaboration and leveraging synergies among projects, STG Holding aims to build a sustainable and successful future.
about.in-our-ultra:
In our ultra-modern factory, we can build a machine tailored to your requirements from concept to commissioning in 12 to 16 weeks.

Today, we have expanded our range of mining equipment to include dump trucks, surface drill rigs, long drill rigs, dump trucks and roof rigs.

For the material handling department of the underground mining industry, we manufacture hydrostatic belt conveyors, material conveyors including scissor lifts, blast conveyors and material wagons manufactured to customer specifications. They can be in a muted design or a cassette design.
about.st-stg:
At STG - Enterprise, we pride ourselves on delivering excellence in every project we undertake. Our commitment to quality, safety, and customer satisfaction is evident in the positive reviews and feedback we receive from our clients. Here are a few highlights that showcase our dedication to excellence

Our team of skilled professionals brings years of experience and expertise to every construction project. Whether it’s residential, commercial, or industrial construction, we ensure that every detail is executed to perfection. Our clients consistently commend us for our meticulous attention to detail and the superior quality of our work.

seo.title: Our Services - STG Enterprise

services.title: SERVICES
services.description: Our priority is customer satisfaction. We work with clients individually to understand their unique needs and goals.
services.wall-thickness: STG Enterprise is a leader in the field of residential building construction, renowned for its innovative and high-quality projects. The company builds homes that not only provide comfort but also meet the most modern environmental and technological standards.
services.operating-weight: The leader in Uzbekistan's mining industry, a symbol of innovation and excellence, as well as an unrivaled leader in the transportation of rock masses. The company demonstrated impressive growth, increasing the number of employees from 94 at the beginning of 2023 to 675 by the end of 2024.
services.gross-power: This is a modern café that combines a stylish atmosphere with delicious food. We specialize in preparing appetizing hot dogs, juicy burgers, and unique innovations in the world of fast food. Every dish is made with fresh ingredients and attention to taste, ensuring every guest leaves satisfied.
services.weight-7: This is a company specializing in the construction of industrial facilities and the production of excavation equipment. We offer comprehensive solutions for enterprises, ensuring high work quality, reliable machinery, and innovative approaches.
services.weight-15: A leader in the mining industry of Uzbekistan, actively implementing advanced technologies and contributing to the development of the sector. The company has extensive experience in mineral extraction and efficient management of natural resources, ensuring high work quality.
services.max-operating: This is an advanced management system designed to optimize the logistics of heavy-duty trucks, their repair, and warehouse operations. We have developed an innovative CRM platform that ensures complete management of the entire process—from logistics to technical maintenance—with maximum efficiency and precision.
services.rated-budget: This is a convenient mobile app that offers home-cooked meal delivery not only to offices and companies but to anyone interested. We deliver fresh, tasty, and diverse meals prepared with care, so everyone can enjoy the true comfort of home at any time.
services.emission-class: This is an international company specializing in the design and construction of mining facilities and quarry developments worldwide. We provide comprehensive solutions for the construction and operation of mines, quarries, and other mineral extraction sites, including project development, construction management, and the implementation of modern technologies.
